definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: manger, crib (Aram. [[אוּדְיׇא]], 0uwryo0, Ar. 0’a0riy=un stall, etc., As. urû Dl:BAS i. 211)—Pl. [[אֻרָוֹת]] 2Ch 32:28 (Aram. form for [[אֳרָוֹת]]; cf. Lag:BN 172); cstr. [[אֻרְוֹת]] 1Ki 5:6, [[אֻֽרְיוֹת]] 2Ch 9:25; crib of horses 1Ki 5:6 (app. in enumeration horses themselves, Eng. head, or span, cf. also 2Ch 9:25 with 1Ki 10:26; So Th MV, but txt. here dub. cf. Klo), hence 2Ch 9:25; of any animals ([[כל־בהמה]]) 2Ch 32:28 (on ´[[לַאֲ]] v. Add.).
